main_definition: To present or bring to someone's attention, usually by mentioning the name of something or someone new.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Preparing for a person or thing that will be seen publicly
meanings_and_examples.example: At the event, I was introduced to the famous author as she signed copies of her latest book.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To present something new to an audience or group
meanings_and_examples.example: The host is introducing a groundbreaking invention that will revolutionize modern living.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Starting or beginning to tell about someone or something
meanings_and_examples.example: Before discussing the details of her research, she introduced herself and briefly explained her background.
